Description:
ELEGANT DESIGN,SUPERB OUTDOOR LIVING!
This ultra-spacious three bedroom town residence, just minutes from East Melbourne parks, the MCG, Smith Street and Victoria Street restaurants, offers exceptional outdoor entertaining areas - a landscaped garden, large balcony, and roof terrace with stunning city views. Entry from the delightful front garden is to a good-sized home office, equipped with home theatre facilities, adjoining a remote entry double garage and separate laundry. Three spacious bedrooms and a bathroom occupy the middle level; the main bedroom includes a walk-in wardrobe and a stylish ensuite bathroom. Floored in mellow hardwood, the living and dining area flows out to a north-facing balcony overlooking the garden. To one side of this expansive entertaining area, the timber-finished kitchen features Blanco appliances and stone bench tops. On the upper level, the roof top deck provides panoramic CBD and northerly views.
This surprisingly quiet light-filled low maintenance property, finished to the highest standards, features generous storage, ducted heating and cooling, video entry, alarm system and premium fittings. It's a must-see!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
Insights: 18 other 3 bedroom unit in COLLINGWOOD have recently been sold.

Description:
FABULOUS LIFESTYLE WITH UNINTERRUPTED CITY VIEWS!
In a block of only six, this top-floor apartment boasts one of inner-Melbourne's most spectacular city panoramas, plus an abundance of lifestyle attractions just moments away. Filled with natural light, the tastefully enhanced interior features two large bedrooms (both with built-in robes) and updated central bathroom, spacious lounge/meals area and adjoining kitchen, as well as internal laundry facilities and undercover parking space. Quiet, secure and brilliantly positioned, it's a must-see property for investors, professionals and first-time buyers, close to cafes and restaurants, freeway access, trams and trains to the CBD!

Description:
SPACIOUS.PRIVATE.PEACEFUL.
Behind a quiet façade lies Collingwood's most uncommon and desirable offering - a family sized architect designed home that will be enjoyed in private and with friends.
It is superbly located in a quiet pocket only 3.5 Km from the city and close to all public transport, schools and parks. A gorgeous open plan living area is awash with natural light and features high ceilings, timber floor and concertina doors opening onto a courtyard garden.
The home has 4 bedrooms, some with BIR's and city views, a large north facing balcony, designer kitchen, 2.5 bathrooms, separate study and laundry, gas and electric heating and reverse cycle A/C. There is also excellent rear access via the right of way.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
STYLISH, SPACIOUS & PRIVATE
This contemporary upper level apartment is a fine example of inner city living at its best. Comprising generous living space that opens onto private north facing balcony, separate kitchen/dining area, two large bedrooms with BIR's, central bathroom with bath, separate laundry and secure off street parking. Positioned in the heart of Collingwood and offering all the modern amenities, this apartment really has it all.

Description:
SOLD BY FRANK DI COLA- 0400 826 100
Located within a short walk trams and the central business district this one bedroom apartment is currently leased as student accommodation and is returning $1,100 per month.
This unit was recently refurbished, however the bathroom will require re painting again.
Due to the existing tenancy, access to this Unit may prove to be difficult and we strongly recommend you book your appointment in advance so we can notify the tenant.
Note: This property can be sold at any time and all buyers are pre warned that the asking price may be exceeded depending on the buyer response.
Terms strictly ten percent deposit on signing and the balance within 30 days, no exceptions will be allowed.

Description:
AFFORDABLE WAREHOUSE STYLE IN MELBOURNE’S HOTTEST LOCATION
Located in the heart of Melbourne’s premier lifestyle and gallery precinct, this mezzanine format one bedroom plus office environment is positioned at the rear of the building, and integrates sun splashed open plan living and spectacular views to the Dandenongs with a generous outdoor terrace / courtyard (ideal for summer entertaining), and secure remote accessed garage parking. Positioned near the corner of Brunswick and Gertrude Sts, this superb clean line space affords the capital appreciation and lifestyle benefits inherent in its location, without any of the noise!

Description:
FRONT OF CLASS
Situated at the front of the building this elegant, Victorian warehouse shell has been transformed to provide a lofty living environment.
The living room is orientated to the East maximising the morning sun aspect. Including restored trusses and ceiling lining boards, the touch of old is harmoniously combined with
the modern amenities that we so desire. Downstairs includes bathroom, double bedroom (BIR), under-stair storage including built-in wine storage, laundry, vast open living area & modern kitchen. Upstairs: excellent storage, large bathroom with bath and very spacious main bedroom suite.
Included with the property is two car spaces and a storage cage. See it!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
SHOPFRONT AND DWELLING: SPACE AND STYLE!
Formerly a corner butcher shop and separate terrace house, this historic double storey Victorian property is now an exceptionally spacious and well-renovated family residence, combining period character with modern style. Entry is to a well-proportioned sitting room, leading on one side to a sunny home office/fourth bedroom (formerly the corner shop), and on the other to a good-sized dining room, separated by a cut out wall from the kitchen, equipped with Bosch appliances. Set to one side of the dining room is a second living room, where French doors open to the brick-paved northerly courtyard. At the rear of the house is a new two-zone bathroom and concealed laundry, with door and louvress to the courtyard (compact off-street parking from Charlotte Street). Upstairs are three further double bedrooms (two with CBD views), a second tiled bathroom, a large fitted study/retreat opening to a north facing expansive roof terrace from which you can pick your very own peaches.
This warm and inviting property features polished concrete floors, open fire places and other period detail, quality cabinetry, heating and reverse-cycle air conditioning. Gold Street Primary, Queens Parade cafes, Smith St and transport are within easy walking distance.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
COSMOPOLITAN COLLINGWOOD!
ARE YOU READY FOR A CULTURE SHOCK?
On offer is a magnificent, near new, inner city apartment of the highest quality situated in the Marque Complex in a fantastic location in Collingwood.
With an open plan living room, adjoining gourmet kitchen featuring stone finishes, stainless steel appliances, and a massive sundrenched patio (approx. 12.5sq.m) this apartment has it all.
This superb apartment also features a double bedroom with a BIR, separate study, fully tiled bathroom with a European style laundry, plus one car park on title.
Location is second to none being only minutes away from the delights of Smith Street and Brunswick Street, offering bars, restaurants, outlet shopping and Gertrude Street Village. The CBD and MCG are within easy walking distance but for extra convenience, the city tram is just 200 metres away.
Ideal for the first home buyer and investor alike, this outstanding apartment offers everything your heart could desire.
Currently leased at $1,739.00PCM.
Photo ID Required
Graham Hicks : 0423009900

Description:
STYLISH AND SURPRISINGLY SPACIOUS!
Here is a wonderful first home or secure investment. In a well-maintained development of only six, with maximum quiet and privacy, this light-filled apartment has been elegantly refurbished in clean-edged contemporary style. Opening to one side of the entrance hallway are a sunny double bedroom, and a tiled bathroom/laundry with overbath shower and separate WC. The kitchen, newly fitted with glossy cabinetry, tiled splashbacks and stainless steel range, is large enough to accommodate a meals area. Set to the front of the apartment with large windows giving Fitzroy views are an expansive living/dining room and second double bedroom with built-in wardrobes.
With timber floors and smart fittings, this delightful apartment, close to transport, cafes and freeway access, includes a security entrance and lock-up garage.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Stylish Inner City living…
Located at the ‘Paris’ end of Collingwood this beautifully presented 2 bedroom contemporary town residence offers a lifestyle to savour just a short stroll to the delights of Smith & Brunswick Streets with their diverse eateries, superb specialty shops and myriad of public transport options. Part of a 3 lot subdivision each with their own street frontage and possessing a unique architecturally designed façade with a distinct industrial edge, this delightful abode is bathed in Northerly light and is certainly an entertainer’s delight enjoying huge open plan living/dining areas, tranquil downstairs courtyard, sizeable upstairs balcony, study/home office, 2 bathrooms, fully equipped gourmet kitchen, laundry and single lock up garage with ample storage. Other features include rich timber floors, reverse cycle heating/cooling, walk in robe and quality fittings & fixtures.

Description:
A CLASSIC ADOPTS A CONTEMPORARY APPROACH
Behind period aesthetics that have clearly stood the test of time, this exceptional unusually wide Victorian reveals renovated spaces illustrative of distinctive design flair and an evident focus on quality. Open-plan living/dining areas incorporate a kitchen in which stone bench tops and European appliances ensure elegance and efficiency form a highly successful combination. To the rear, wide double doors flow out to a courtyard backdrop featuring decked entertaining, a romantic pergola and the natural asset of north easterly aspects. Two downstairs bedrooms sharing an impressively appointed bathroom include a bright front bedroom and a central second bedroom with fabulous roof windows that introduce abundant natural light to its pleasing proportions. Upstairs, a luxuriously large main bedroom represents the ultimate retreat and includes three Velux windows, huge integrated storage and a state-of-the-art ensuite. Surround sound, heating/cooling and Bosch security are amongst additional assets of a home which reveals all the benefits of recently completed renovation. An outstanding inner city lifestyle is assured by a location that is both beautifully quiet and completely convenient
Glenn Bartlett : 0418 337 710

Description:
FABULOUS INNER-CITY LIFESTYLE!
Modern and well-appointed, this sensational studio apartment (40m2 approximately) resides in the stunning Marque complex, just moments from Smith Street in the very heart of cosmopolitan Collingwood. A terrific opportunity for both investors and professionals, the apartment’s light-filled interior features a stylish bathroom, stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances and dishwasher, generous living space out to full-width terrace. Other highlights include split-system heating and cooling, quality carpets and floor tiles, laundry facilities, plus video intercom, lift access and secure entrance foyer, basement car space and storage locker. With trams virtually at your doorstep, it’s also close to Collingwood Station, Gertrude Street Village, Brunswick Street cafés and bars. Owners corp apx $1405p/a.Securely let until September 2012 for 320pw.

Description:
FULLY RENOVATED AND AFFORDABLE
On a wider than usual block, this attractively and thoroughly renovated semi-detached Edwardian offers exciting entry level buying into one of the inner city's most vibrant and rapidly evolving locations. An efficient layout of 2 double bedrooms, large central bathroom, kitchen with quality fit out, and light filled open plan living (with heating and cooling) opening to private north-facing yard.
Nothing further required other than for you to move in and enjoy, only moments walk from cafes, renowned local shopping strips, and transport.

Description:
SPACE, COMFORT AND COLLINGWOOD HISTORY
This wide block-fronted residence, built in 1917, is next door to the birthplace of the legendary John Wren, whose first betting business was centred around Gold Street and the adjacent laneways. A wide hallway opens from the front verandah to three exceptionally spacious and well-lit bedrooms. Double doors lead to the well-proportioned living and dining room, open to a modern kitchen with polished concrete floors. To one side is a good-sized bathroom, with free standing clawfoot bath and separate shower, and a laundry recess. Timber and glass folding doors open to a pergola and bluestone paved courtyard to two sides. Featuring timber floorboards and reverse-cycle air conditioning, here is a sunny family home providing comfortable living for many years to come, with potential to add further value in a rapidly appreciating precinct close to cafes, transport and freeway access.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd
